string.name: reason
string.value: [TS_917250]_These may include lock screen notifications, banners, badges, sounds, and vibrations. You can change this in Settings.

string.name: reason_tv
string.value: [TS_1057966]_Notifications will be delivered as banners. You can change your notification preferences at any time in Settings.

string.name: ban_affect
string.value:
[TS_1151004]_
If you select Deny, you won't receive chat message notifications from this app.
